question: A uniform electric field vector E exists along horizontal direction as shown. The electric potential at A is VA. A small point charge q is slowly taken from A to B along the curved path as shown. The potential energy of the charge when it is at point B is
images/c3d4e5f6-a7b8-4c9d-0e1f-2a3b4c5d6e7f.png
explanation: Potential decreases in direction of field. $V_B = V_A - Ex$.
Potential Energy $U_B = q V_B = q(V_A - Ex)$.
